name: Feline Frenzy (zahramiah)
description:
Your cats have escaped your dream home and ran into your neighbors' yard!

Armed with an unlimited supply of treats and a multitude of disguises, you infiltrate the house to rescue the cats.

______________________________________________________________________________________

The game features prop hunt mechanics which allow you to change into items around the level. Use Q and aim at objects to transform into them (not all objects can be used as a disguise).  Try disguising as the nearest chair or plant. It is easier to aim at objects in first person mode.  Use E to revert back into the character to navigate the scene easily.  Laying bait while running is more effective to let the treats reach the cats faster before they can get away.

Controls:

Q - Disguise

E - Change back from disguise

Right mouse button - Lay bait

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

V - Change camera view

Credit:
